content: I'm also considering implementing a chatbot for my web application, and I met a founder of a startup that's working on an AI-powered chatbot at a startup networking event at a coworking space in downtown area a few weeks ago. We had a great conversation about the challenges of building a scalable user acquisition strategy, and I introduced him to my friend Emily who's an expert in that area. Do you think a chatbot could help with security as well?
